definitions.definition: The eighteenth letter of the Classical and Modern Greek alphabets ( Σ , σ ), the twentieth letter of Old and Ancient .
The symbol Σ , used to indicate summation of a set or series .
The symbol σ , used to indicate one standard deviation from the mean , particularly in a normal distribution .
A sigma male ( a self-reliant and assertive male ) .

main_definition: The eighteenth letter of the Classical and Modern Greek alphabets ( Σ , σ ), the twentieth letter of Old and Ancient .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) The symbol Σ , used to indicate summation of a set or series .
( statistics ) The symbol σ , used to indicate one standard deviation from the mean , particularly in a normal distribution .
( Internet slang ) A sigma male ( a self-reliant and assertive male ) .
